titleStmt.title: This is the dyalogus or co[m]munyng betwxt [sic] the wyse king Salomon and Marcolphus
Salomon et Marcolphus. English.

notesStmt.note: A translation of a version of "Salomon et Marcolphus", a text of Gnostic origin. A different version from STC 22899.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
